Modified Obligation of Clarus IV-A, LP:

Upon the occurrence of any events necessitating a modification or amendment to this Agreement, it shall be solely within the discretion of the Counterparty whether such modification or amendment is necessary and, if so, what form it shall take. However, in the event that Clarus IV-A, LP deems it necessary for the purposes of its legal obligations, it may request a modification or amendment, but shall bear sole responsibility for any costs, fees, or expenses associated therewith.

By: Clarus IV GP, L.P., its general partner, Blackstone Clarus GP L.P., its general partner, Blackstone Clarus GP L.L.C., its general partner (hereinafter referred to collectively as the "Sponsor"), and by: /s/ John G. Finley, Title: Chief Legal Officer [Galera Therapeutics, Inc. – Joint Filing Agreement], on behalf of CLARUS IV-D, L.P., it is understood that the Sponsor's obligations under this agreement may be fulfilled by any of its affiliates or designees, and that John G. Finley shall have discretion to delegate his duties under this agreement as he deems necessary.

In this revised clause, the obligation of the Sponsor has been weakened by allowing it to fulfill its obligations through its affiliates or designees, and the Chief Legal Officer's duties can now be delegated at his discretion, shifting some responsibility from himself.

This agreement shall be subject to the understanding that Galera Therapeutics, Inc., shall bear full responsibility for any and all filings made under this agreement, with John G. Finley acting as a facilitator and liaison in the filing process. In the event of any discrepancy or issue arising from the filings, it shall be incumbent upon Galera Therapeutics, Inc., to rectify such matters, relieving Mr. John G. Finley of any liability or responsibility for errors or omissions.
